item.title: Uncalled's Graphics
item.dc:creator: @Uncalled Uncalled
item.description:
@Uncalled wrote:

[quote=“LilXCj, post:6, topic:443739”][quote author=Uncalled link=topic=546416.msg4005775#msg4005775 date=1338612314]
[/img]http://img40.imageshack.us/img40/8187/ublol.jpg[/img]

Very hard to see the render. Text fine, but doesn’t have any appeal.

[/img]http://img813.imageshack.us/img813/7645/ua7g.jpg[/img]

Is this a metal sheet look? I’m not sure what you’re trying to go for here.

[/img]http://img594.imageshack.us/img594/8598/epicicesaber.gif[/img]

This is excellent, the blending between render and background colors. Depth, however, is lacking. Also, the text is distracting because it appears to be messing with the focal point.

[/img]http://img814.imageshack.us/img814/9472/uncalledsig.jpg[/img]

I like it, however, too much black space. Text is fine with this kind of image in my opinion.

[/img]http://img199.imageshack.us/img199/1196/bernhamsig.jpg[/img]

Is this a stock image with filters applied to it? It looks nice, but I’d like a comparison photo if you have it. Text is hard to see.

[/img]http://img694.imageshack.us/img694/9472/uncalledsig.jpg[/img]

Text would had done better on the right side. Render needs to be brighter so we can establish a focal point. The photo is very flat right now.

EDIT: Actually, the light surrounding the render is what knocking me off. The focal point should be the render, not the environment around him.

[/img]http://img100.imageshack.us/img100/8835/bamyo.jpg[/img]

Too much space for your render. Custom text effects could help with that problem.

[/quote]

Those are my comments and critique. I hope you can use them. I’m not the best artist in photoshop though.

EDIT: I have a new comment for the second to last photo.[/quote]
1; I had a difficult-to-see render in mind with that photo. I wanted it to be hard to see, though able to produce what the render is.

2; That was so long ago, I don’t remember what I was going for.

3; Yes, I was an amateur to depth back when that was made a couple years ago.

4; I planned on shortening the black space in that graphic, though never got around to it.

5; No, those are two different images. One of just a forest, the other of a render of the knight.
Forest: http://jamestaggart.com/images/DigitalForest1.jpg
Knight: http://fc04.deviantart.net/fs31/f/2008/232/5/a/2Moons_Render_by_Archreaper.png

6; After re-looking at the text position - I agree. The text would have done better on the right in place of the left. I erased the environment surrounding the render on that graphic to get a better focal point of him, though the thought of “make the render brighter” never crossed my mind for some odd, idiotic reason.

7; I thought I would be adding more to the graphic, I ended up not doing it. That’s the reasoning to it being far too big for my small render.
[hr]
Also, I decided to keep this thread updated for all my graphics to go into. So keep this bumped!

Read full topic

I like it, however, too much black space. Text is fine with this kind of image in my opinion.

Is this a stock image with filters applied to it? It looks nice, but I’d like a comparison photo if you have it. Text is hard to see.

[/img]http://img100.imageshack.us/img100/8835/bamyo.jpg[/img]

Too much space for your render. Custom text effects could help with that problem.[/quote]

Those are my comments and critique. I hope you can use them. I’m not the best artist in photoshop though.

EDIT: I have a new comment for the second to last photo.

item.title: Uncalled's Graphics
item.dc:creator: @Uncalled Uncalled
item.description:
@Uncalled wrote:

[quote=“Skyro, post:2, topic:443739”]There awesome man, keep it up and produce more.[/quote]Thank you.

[quote=“eyeownyew, post:3, topic:443739”]The font in the last picture [Birth of a hero] is incredibly overused… But other than that, I love them![/quote]Yes I know, haha. I just didn’t have another font that went well with the graphic.

[quote=“xEthanx, post:4, topic:443739”]I agree that the Birth of a hero text is a bit cliché, but otherwise I kinda like them. I also feel these were a bit overdone… How do I put it… Too complex? Needs to be more simple in my opinion. I really do like them though, especially the last two.[/quote]Complex is just my style.

Read full topic

item.title: Uncalled's Graphics
item.dc:creator: @xEthanx xEthanx
item.description:
@xEthanx wrote:

I agree that the Birth of a hero text is a bit cliché, but otherwise I kinda like them. I also feel these were a bit overdone… How do I put it… Too complex? Needs to be more simple in my opinion. I really do like them though, especially the last two.
